description: This file defines a class 'ModelsLabTools' that extends a 'Toolkit' class, providing methods to generate media (video, audio, images) via external API calls, handle media artifacts, and wait for media processing completion. It includes configuration for different media types and manages external API interactions.

classes.name: ModelsLabTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Modelslab API to generate and fetch media content, handling different media types and asynchronous processing.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the ModelsLabTools with configuration parameters, setting API URLs based on file type, and setting up tools.

methods.name: _create_payload
methods.description: Creates the request payload for media generation based on the media type and prompt.

methods.name: _add_media_artifact
methods.description: Adds the generated media artifact to the agent or team, depending on media type.

methods.name: _wait_for_media
methods.description: Polls the fetch URL to wait for media processing to complete, with timeout handling.

methods.name: generate_media
methods.description: Main method to generate media content based on a prompt, handle API responses, and attach artifacts.
